orig_text:
At that meeting, a decision was made to
     form a design team to write a document offering advice
     from the IPv6 WG to the 3GPP community, regarding
     their use of IPv6.
correct_text:
At that meeting, a decision was made
     form a design team to write a document offering advice
     from the IPv6 WG to the 3GPP community, regarding
     their use of IPv6.
